id.description: Unique identifier of the routing queue

division.description: Division to which the queue belongs

descriptions.description: Additional descriptive information about the routing queue

dateCreated.description: Date and time when the queue was created

dateModified.description: Date and time when the queue was last modified

modifiedBy.description: User who last modified the routing queue

createdBy.description: User who created the routing queue

memberCount.description: Total number of members (agents + users) in the queue

userMemberCount.description: Number of users currently joined in the queue

joinedMemberCount.description: Number of agents currently joined in the queue

memberGroups.description: Groups of members associated with the queue

skillEvaluationMethod.description: Method used for evaluating agent skills to assign contacts

queueFlow.description: Queue flow configuration to determine how contacts are delivered to agents

autoAnswerOnly.description: Indicates if the queue is set to automatically answer incoming calls

enableTranscription.description: Indicates if transcription feature is enabled for the queue

enableManualAssignment.description: Indicates if manual agent assignment is enabled for the queue

callingPartyName.description: Name of the calling party associated with the queue

callingPartyNumber.description: Phone number of the calling party associated with the queue

defaultScripts.description: Default script configurations associated with the queue

peerId.description: Identifier of the peer queue (if any) associated with this queue

selfUri.description: URI link to access details of the routing queue
